FLOOD.title: üåä Flood Safety
advice: Move to higher ground immediately
Do not walk or drive through flood waters
Stay away from power lines and electrical wires
If trapped, go to the highest level of the building
Signal for help from a window if needed
Do not drink flood water

LANDSLIDE.title: ‚õ∞Ô∏è Landslide Safety
advice: Evacuate immediately if safe to do so
Move away from the path of the slide
Go to designated evacuation areas
Listen for unusual sounds like cracking trees
Stay alert when driving on mountain roads
If escape not possible, curl into a tight ball

ROAD_BLOCK.title: üöß Road Block Advisory
advice: Do not attempt to move debris yourself
Find alternative routes if possible
Report exact location to authorities
Stay in vehicle if on road
Turn on hazard lights
Wait for emergency services

POWER_LINE.title: ‚ö° Power Line Danger
advice: Stay at least 10 meters away from downed lines
Assume all power lines are live
Do not touch anything in contact with the line
If in vehicle near line, stay inside
Warn others to stay away
Call emergency services immediately

BUILDING_COLLAPSE.title: üèöÔ∏è Building Collapse
advice: Do not enter damaged buildings
Stay away from weakened structures
If trapped, tap on pipes to alert rescuers
Cover your mouth to avoid dust inhalation
Use phone flashlight to signal if possible
Stay calm and conserve energy

FIRE.title: üî• Fire Safety
advice: Evacuate immediately - do not gather belongings
Stay low to avoid smoke inhalation
Feel doors before opening - if hot, don't open
Use stairs, never elevators
If clothes catch fire: Stop, Drop, Roll
Call emergency services once safe

OTHER.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è General Emergency
advice: Stay calm and assess the situation
Move to a safe location if possible
Call emergency services: 119
Follow instructions from authorities
Help others if you can do so safely
Wait for official updates
